paper_abstract: In this paper, we shall first introduce the definitions of modified D-P metrics for fuzzy set-valued random variables so that the related spaces of fuzzy set-valued random variables are complete. By using a modified DP metric, we shall define the variance and covariance of fuzzy set-valued random variables and show their application in statistical estimation.
paper_title: The modified D-p-metric space of fuzzy set-valued random variables and its application to variances
